title: Reschedule Production due to Material Shortage
description: A planner discovers a critical raw material will be delayed and needs to reschedule all affected work orders.

tasks.description: Identify all scheduled work orders that require the delayed material.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a list of all impacted work orders for the next week.

tasks.description: Place the affected work orders on hold.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent changes the status of all identified work orders to 'On Hold - Material'.

tasks.description: Rerun the scheduling algorithm for the affected work centers to fill the new gaps with other jobs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully regenerates the production schedule to optimize throughput with available jobs.
